channel.title: [PI]MySQL wont connect - Hiscores
channel.description:
[code]Loaded clipmap in 249ms. [21/07/11 10:45]: Launching ************... [21/07/11 10:45]: java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host '**. .***.***' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server" [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError. ava:1055) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError. ava:956) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1102
[21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(Connection mpl.java:2142) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.<init>(ConnectionImpl. ava:773) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.<init>(JDBC4Connectio .java:46) [21/07/11 10:45]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstanc 0(Native Method) [21/07/11 10:45]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstanc (Unknown Source) [21/07/11 10:45]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newIns ance(Unknown Source) [21/07/11 10:45]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown So rce) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(Connection mpl.java:352) [21/07/11 10:45]: at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegis eringDriver.java:282) [21/07/11 10:45]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [21/07/11 10:45]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [21/07/11 10:45]: at server.model.players.Highscores.process(Highscores.j va:18) [21/07/11 10:45]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:112) [21/07/11 10:45]: Failed to connect to MySQL Database! [21/07/11 10:45]: Loaded clipmap in 171ms. [21/07/11 10:45]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594[/code] Okay so evrythings 100% correct and it wont allow to connect the Host to the mysql database so how can i make it work?

item.title: [PI]MySQL wont connect - Hiscores

item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

I set it up with webhost not with xampp.

item.title: [PI]MySQL wont connect - Hiscores
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Do you have Xampp installed? Do you have the service MySQL installed? Do you have it running? Do you have your database set up? Do you have a password set up? Do you have the correct password and username in the class where you connect to the database?

Read full topic
